resources.string: enter a title for this subject

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The official currency of the State of Saudi Arabia is the Saudi Dinar?
Toubkal is the highest mountain peak in the Arab world?
Algeria is the largest Arab country in terms of area?
Batumi is the capital of Georgia?

string-array.name: answers_details
string-array.item: The official currency of the State of Saudi Arabia is the Saudi Riyal
Toubkal is the highest peak of Jbeil in the Arab world and is located in Morocco
Algeria is the largest Arab and African country in terms of area
Tbilisi is the capital of Georgia
